channel.title: CVE Feed for Themewinter -- WPCafe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themewinter -- WPCafe

item.title: CVE-2024-37513|2024-07-30T17:26:49.792Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Themewinter WPCafe allows Path Traversal.This issue affects WPCafe: from n/a through 2.2.27.
